note: For the service station arrivals in Problem 7.37, what is the probability that fewer than 30 cars enter the station between 4 P.M. and 6 P.M. on a randomly selected day? Ans. 0.0485
title: During the 4 P.M. to 6 P.M. peak period in an automobile service station, one car enters the station every 3 min, on average. What is the probability that at least 25 cars enter the station for service between 4 P.M
